content: in this legal case the court has made a final ruling in favor of the heirs of a deceased person the court has divided the deceased persons estate which includes a property a corporate share and a cash amount among the heirs additionally the court has ordered a mortgage to be registered in favor of a creditor and has authorized the transcription of the judgment the court has also divided the costs of the litigation between the parties involved and awarded compensation to the defendants for their legal fees and expenses the court has settled the costs of the courtappointed expert witness and has made a final decision in the case
